channel.title: Someone please tell CumeScape that his site is a CMS, please!
channel.description:
K so basically, me and cumscape got into a argument over something stupid. He says his site , zyberscape, is not a cms site (custom by him btw) when it actually is, you can sign up on his site, make a thread, and even edit it, which entirely declares his forum as a cms. Okay, 8 times out of 10 most kids on this site will say coding is not the same as programming, actually it is. What I really want to say is [url=http://zyberscape.com/thread.php?c=1&f=3&t=98&goto=1]zyberscape[/url] is a cms! And I got the evidence to proove it:
A content management system (CMS or Web CMS) is content management system (CMS) software, [b]usually implemented as a Web application, for creating and managing HTML content.[/b] It is used to manage and control a large, dynamic collection of Web material (HTML documents and their associated images). A CMS facilitates content creation, content control, editing, and many essential Web maintenance functions. [b]Most systems use a database to store content[/b], metadata, and/or artifacts that might be needed by the system. Content is frequently, but not universally, stored as XML, to facilitate reuse and enable flexible presentation options. [b]Administration is typically done through browser-based interfaces, but some systems require the use of a fat client.[/b] Unlike Web-site builders like Microsoft FrontPage or [b]Adobe Dreamweaver[/b], a [b]CMS allows non-technical users to make changes to an existing website with little or no training[/b]. A [b]CMS typically [sub]requires an experienced coder to set up and add features[/sub], but is primarily a Web-site maintenance tool for non-technical administrators.[/b]
The CMS fully automates the publishing of your site
Ok, so if your a person that actually knows what a cms is, you should and would know that this is a CMS! Now tell cumscape his website is a cms, cuz he thinks its not. Its wierd how he knows what CMS mean, but not knowing what the purpose of it is...

item.title: Someone please tell CumeScape that his site is a CMS, please!
item.dc:creator: @silabsoft RuneAgent

item.title: Someone please tell CumeScape that his site is a CMS, please!
item.dc:creator: @Greeny Greeny
item.description:
@Greeny wrote:

He’s trying to make us tell a moparscaper to stop lying that his site is ripped and stolen.

What a stupid, pointless thing to do… Is there anything on moparscape that wasn’t stolen from someone else?

Read full topic

item.title: Someone please tell CumeScape that his site is a CMS, please!

item.description:
@BAsh wrote:

[quote=“ThAt0n36Uy, post:4, topic:266527”][quote author=Unhandled link=topic=351999.msg2700632#msg2700632 date=1236564962]

wtf this thread is trippin me out

seconded.

What the fuck are you going on about?
[/quote]
Thirded.

What the shit are you talking about?[/quote]
Fourthed.

/bandwagon

Read full topic
